text: Maccabi Ahva Yarka, (; ), is an Israeli football club based in Yarka. The club played in Liga Gimel Upper Galilee division during the 2015–16 season. ==History== The club was founded in 2013,Home Ground Didn't Really Helped Avi Papis, 25 December 2013, DoublePass replacing the former senior football club in Yarka, Otzma Bnei Yarka, which was closed in 2010.Ahva Yarka Lose 2–6 to Ironi Safed Nizar Abu Akl, 19 October 2013, a-Shams A Youth Team Launched in Yarka 26 August 2010, Wen.co.il In its first season in Liga Gimel the club finished fourth, but achieved less success since, finishing 10th in its second season and 8th in its third. ==External links== *Maccabi Ahva Yarka The Israel Football Association *Facebook Page ==References== Yarka Category:Association football clubs established in 2013 Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 2019 Category:2013 establishments in Israel Category:2019 disestablishments in Israel Category:Druze community in Israel Yarka
title: Maccabi Ahva Yarka F.C.
